name: AaveV2Bundled
description: AaveV2Bundled contract. This contract allows the "bundling" of various Aave V2 functions into a single transaction. Developed alongside AaveV2Proxy and AaveV2ProxyFactory.

functionDecorators.name: batchDeposit
functionDecorators.description: This function allows the caller to deposit multiple assets and receive multiple aTokens in return with a single transaction. This contract must be approved for each asset. Assets are mapped to amounts. E.g: amounts[i] is deposited for assets[i] and amounts[i+1] is deposited for assets[i+1].

parameterDecorators.name: assets
parameterDecorators.description: The array of assets to deposit, mapped to amounts.

parameterDecorators.name: amounts
parameterDecorators.description: The array of amounts to deposit, mapped to assets.

parameterDecorators.name: onBehalfOf
parameterDecorators.description: The array of addresses to send the aTokens to.

functionDecorators.name: batchRepay
functionDecorators.description: This function allows the caller to repay debts denominated in multiple currencies in the same transaction. This contract must be approved for each asset. Assets are mapped to amounts. E.g: amounts[i] is repaid for assets[i] debt and amounts[i+1] is repaid for assets[i+1] debt.

parameterDecorators.name: assets
parameterDecorators.description: The array of reserve assets to repay, mapped to amounts and rateModes.

parameterDecorators.name: amounts
parameterDecorators.description: The array of amounts to repay, mapped to assets and rateModes.

parameterDecorators.name: rateModes
parameterDecorators.description: The array of interest rate modes for each debt to repay, mapped to assets and amounts.

parameterDecorators.name: onBehalfOf
parameterDecorators.description: The array of addresses for which to repay the debt.
